name: wififly-fullstack
description: Local full-stack WiFiFly speed test application

scripts.bootstrap: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ..
scripts.migrate: cd backend && npm run migrate && cd ..
scripts.seed: cd backend && npm run seed && cd ..
scripts.reset-db: cd backend && npm run reset-db && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
